group_1.narration: To be honest, I actually haven't@been doing so great these days.
In class, during track practice,@or even with Yuna and the others,@all I can think about is running.

group_1.textCenter: (I wonder what time I could get if I got serious@now?)
(I can't do this on the circuit, but I want to know...)
*Sigh*... I'm starting to get frustrated...
How did I deal with this sort of thing in the past?
...[chara:302101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302101:cheek_0][chara:302101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302101:motion_200][chara:302101:lipSynch_1]Oh, right.

group_1.narration: I'd always go for a run,@whether I was upset or happy.

group_1.textCenter: ...Okay, that settles it.
Let's go for a run!
If I don't run, this fuzzy feeling is never going to@go away!
...Mm-hm, I think this spot should work.
There aren't any houses around,
And nobody else is out and about at this hour.
All right... Let's go for a good, hard run!
For the first time in ages...I'm going to go all out...@Stretch carefully, and then...
...Okay!
(On your marks...)
(Get set...)
...Whew.
I haven't ran that fast in a long time...
That was AWESOME!
(...It feels different from before I became a@Magical Girl, though.)
(I'm a lot faster, but I dunno, that's not enough...)
[chara:302101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€•!?

group_1.textLeft: H-Hikaru?! What are you doing here?!

group_1.textRight: That's my line, finding you practicing in an empty@lot in the middle of the night...
What the heck are you up to?
